Package com.flightbookings.flight_bookings.services

Class FlightServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.flightbookings.flight_bookings.services.FlightServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
FlightService
@Service public class FlightServiceImpl extends Object implements FlightService
Service implementation for managing flight-related operations.

    • getFlightsByAirplaneType

      public List<FlightEntity> getFlightsByAirplaneType(EFlightAirplane airplaneType)
      Retrieves a list of flights that use a specified airplane type.
      Specified by:
      getFlightsByAirplaneType in interface FlightService
      Parameters:
      airplaneType - the type of airplane to filter flights by
      Returns:
      a list of Flight objects that match the specified airplane type

    • updateFlightAvailability

      public void updateFlightAvailability()
      Updates the availability of all flights based on their arrival time and seat availability. If a flight's arrival time has passed or there are no seats available, its availability is set to false.
      Specified by:
      updateFlightAvailability in interface FlightService

    • updateFlight

      public FlightEntity updateFlight(FlightEntity updatedFlight)
      Updates the details of an existing flight.
      Specified by:
      updateFlight in interface FlightService
      Parameters:
      updatedFlight - the Flight object with updated details
      Returns:
      the updated Flight object, or null if the flight does not exist

    • deleteFlight

      public boolean deleteFlight(Long id)
      Deletes a flight by its ID.
      Specified by:
      deleteFlight in interface FlightService
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the flight to delete
      Returns:
      true if the flight was deleted, false if it did not exist
